labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Discord Latest Canary, Xubuntu 16.04, also tested on Win10 Stable
data.actual_result: Their indicator stays green until they are unmuted and they stop talking.
data.short_description: When muting a user in a group DM, if their indicator is green, it will stay way until they are unmuted and it turns grey again
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a group call - Mute someone who's indicator is green
